TopicTitle: Cool site showing live communication with space missions

Articles.Content:
Canberra is currently communicating with Voyager 2 at 1.24 light-days round trip!![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

[http://eyes.nasa.gov/dsn/dsn.html](http://eyes.nasa.gov/dsn/dsn.html)
......Well, then it isn't live is it?

> 
> ......Well, then it isn't live is it?

Using this reasoning nothing is, as any information has its speed of transmission.

As *c* is the highest possible speed of information transmission, we can say this is live.
